title: Terebi Bakari Miteru to Baka ni Naru
description:
The title story "Terebi Bakari Miteru to Baka ni Naru" ("Watching TV All The Time Makes You Stupid") is about a hikikomori, a man trying to help her with her situation and another man taking advantage of said situation.

This anthology also contains 7 other short stories;
* "Nayamanai" (なやまない)
* "Hidoi Yatsura wa Minagoroshi" (ひどいやつらは皆殺し, "Their Terrible Massacre")
* "Hidoi Yatsura wa Minagoroshi 2"
* "Kisaku na Anoko" (きさくなあのこ)
* "Mikata" (「味方」, "Friend" / "Ally")
* "Benri na Doraibu" (便利なドライブ, "The Convenient Drive")
* "Oyogu" (泳ぐ, "Swimming")
